description: This file defines the main routing endpoints for a backend API of a territory capture game, including documentation, websocket stats, and mounting route modules for various features.

methods.name: router.get('/')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the root of the API, providing API documentation and metadata.

methods.name: router.get('/ws/stats')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch WebSocket connection statistics, returning current metrics or error if retrieval fails.
